ygData.subject: Re: How to raise my faction with Trolls ??
ygData.msgSnippet: Doing the quest lowers faction with the bashers and killing her raises it. Killing the bashers maybe? Drokk, da majik trollie
ygData.messageBody:
Doing the quest lowers faction with the bashers and killing her raises
it. Killing the bashers maybe?

Drokk, da majik trollie

"Whitcraft,David" wrote:
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Don't know how to raise faction with trolls (Froggies raise faction with
> trolls? Seems like they do...not sure though).
>
> Problem with this is you need ALOT of cash sometimes....and sometimes you
> only need a few hundred pp. I know one person that used 1500pp and never got
> the hoop...
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: OJB [mailto:oj@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 3:33 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] How to raise my faction with Trolls ??
>
> From: "OJB" <oj@...>
>
> Hail,
>
> I want to do the quest for the ivandyrs (not sure of spelling) hoop, a
> magical earing that gives INT. I have to give Lyunga a ruby to get the
> earing. But she is a troll so hoz do I raise faction with her (I am an
> Erudite). Also can anyone who has done this quest tell me if it gives any
> exp too ?? And if it does how much ?? thx :)
>
> OJB
